original_title: Sri Lanka to probe shooting involving excise officers
original_body_lines: ECONOMYEXT – State Minister for Finance Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said he had called for a report on a shooting incident involving officers of the Excise Department.

“The Commissioner General of Excise has been instructed to provide an urgent report regarding the shooting incident involving a group of Excise officers in the Bambalapitiya area,” he said in a twitter.com message.
On Monday four persons in a van had chased an SUV and one person had shot at the vehicle, reports said.
